methods.description: Gets page load (or an API call) performance from a specified global geography such as Paris, Tokyo, Virginia, Mumbai, Frankfurt, London, Seoul, California, Sao Paolo, and many more.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Geographic location to perform the measurement from (Paris, Hong Kong, Seoul, Mumbai, Sao Paolo, London, etc. see API home page for full list)

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: specific URL to perform load test time

apiDescription: This API provides a timed, browser-simulated page load function (or a measured API call) from the specified geography using a server from that geography.
apiTitle: Interzoid Global Page Load Performance API
